name: In the Matter of Robert McLELLAN

parties: In the Matter of Robert McLELLAN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The motion to remand this case to the Family Court for the hearing scheduled for April 24, 1980 is granted. Upon conclusion of said hearing, the record herein shall be returned to this court forthwith.

attorneys: Sumner David Stone, Cranston, for appellants.
Michael McCarthy, Providence, Dept, for Children and Their Families, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of Robert McLELLAN.
No. 80-21-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 17, 1980.
Sumner David Stone, Cranston, for appellants.
Michael McCarthy, Providence, Dept, for Children and Their Families, for respondent.
